Qscreen: Please answer the following questions as accurately as possible, then tap the button to continue.
planTitle: Based on your previous responses, we recommend you the following plan:
gradualSubTitle: gradually reduce the number of cigarettes you smoke each day
coldPlanSubTitle: stop smoking abruptly and commit to quitting immediately.
planReasoneSub: Based on your smoking habits, this plan helps you quit in a way that suits your lifestyle.
coldPlanReson: Based on your smoking habits and since you are a light smoker this plan shown to be effective for highly motivated individuals.
triggers: What are some of your smoking triggers? check all that counts
week1Goal: Reduce intake by 20%, avoid smoking in the morning
week2Goal: Stick to designated smoke times only
week3Goal: Smoke only half a cigarette per session
coldWeek1Goal: Stay smoke-free and focus on managing cravings
coldWeek2Goal: Stay smoke-free and focus on managing cravings
coldWeek3Goal: Reinforce your motivation and celebrate progress
coldWeek4Goal: Stay committed, you're breaking the habit for good!
